title: Mozilla browser hijacker
content:
So I opened up Firefox just now and got a browser hijacker, looks like from Mozilla. Has Mozilla been hacked or are they doing it? Address is

https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/welcome/11/

Which looks like Mozilla, which in a way is even worse. And this is not my home page it's supposed to open with, I assure you. Seems to be plugging VPN for the holidays. Yeah, right.

title: URLs have suddenly started to flash on low left of screen, when mouse hovers
content: Recently i noticed that URLs flash in the lower left corner of my screen, when mouse hovers over certain things on a web site. Why did it start doing this, and how can i get it to stop? very annoying. Also, when i stream a movie, for example on MUBI, the URL sometimes appears in low left screen and remains, which is distracting. Again, this is something new. Help appreciated! Thanks!
creator: aloysius1044

title: Firefox Browser welcome pages: don't open as last tab
content: I have a lot of tabs open and when I start firefox the welcome page is placed as the last tab. I always have to search where I left off. Please open these pages next to the last used tab. The only other solution I have is to disable this stuff

title: get to my account & bookmarks so I can see them on new computer
content: I have an account on windows computer and old Mac. I just got a new mac. How do I get to my bookmarks that have been saved on my account so they appear on my new Mac?
creator: tedcohen

title: Closing Firefox account associated with deactivated email
content:
Hi there,

I have a Firefox account which was registered using an email associated with a company I no longer work for. Since I have left the company, that email is inactive and I can no longer access it. This means that when I attempt to log into Firefox with that account, I cannot enter the verification / 2FA code because I cannot access the email.

Is there anyway I can close that Firefox account anyway? I do have the Firefox recovery key for that account though. I just wish for all the data associated with said account to be deleted.

Thanks
creator: croslandjozef

title: Perdi todos os meus dados da conta firefoz
content: Tive que formatar meu computador recente... Quando instalei novamente o firefox, ele loga na conta, mas não recupera nada (histórico, senhas, extensões). É como se eu tivesse configurado uma conta nova. Tentei logar em outros dispositivos, e é como se tivesse apagado tudo. É a primeira vez que esse problema acontece, pois já tive que formatar o notebook anteriormente e esse erro nunca aconteceu antes.
creator: rodrigo.liveira1801

title: Firefox claims my account was disconnected.  That was not done by me.  Comcast lost my accounts at the beginning of the 2021.
content: Firefox claims my account (*****@comcast.net) was disconnected. This was not done by me. At the beginning of 2021, Comcast lost my email accounts, and I have not been able to retrieve them. I called Comcast, and they found 3,000 of my emails, but I am still not able to retrieve them. Comcast says my email accounts have not been disconnected.

title: bookmarks

Anyway, is there a way to transfer these into my newly downloaded Firefox browser? Thanks!
